level.heading: Condition of eligibility - Protective or vendor payments.
level.text: If the relative with whom the child is living is found to be ineligible for assistance because of failure to comply with conditions of §§ 4-217.08 and 4-217.09, any aid for which such child is eligible (determined without regard to the needs of the ineligible relative) shall be provided in the form of protective or vendor payments.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-101
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
